short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks how much you have scrolled in real-world distances

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension keeps track of how far you have scrolled since you installed the extension, and tells you the distance in either metric or imperial distance units (as well as in pixels). It is also open-source, with the code available at https://github.com/nullFoo/ScrollMiles
